intro.description:
Welcome to the tutorial to create a new project.
It will help you loading schemes in order to make your beginning easier. Let's get started!

item.title: Create a new project
item.description:
Select File->New Alignment Project in the menu bar at the top of the workbench. This step creates a new empty project.
Now please click the "Click to Perform" button to have the new project created automatically.

item.title: Load a source schema
item.description: Select File->Import->Source schema... to load a source schema.

item.title: Load source data
item.description:
Select File->Import->Source data... to load source data.
This step is optional and needs a loaded source schema.

item.title: Load a target schema
item.description: Select File->Import->Target schema... to load a target schema.
item.onCompletion: Congratulations you created a new project, loaded source and target schemas and maybe some source data. Now you can continue with your first mappings.
